alert.note: Alert for Menard; Schleicher (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 24 at 6:17PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN SCHLEICHER AND WEST CENTRAL MENARD COUNTIES THROUGH 700 PM CDT... At 617 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Adams, or 16 miles northwest of Fort Mckavett, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... The Intersection Of Us-190 And Ranch Road 2084 and Adams. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for west central Texas.
